summary: A calendar entry documenting a scheduled call between Jeffrey Epstein and the FBI, set for June 28, 2019. The entry shows Epstein as the organizer and an FBI office as an attendee, indicating direct communication between Epstein and federal investigators shortly before his arrest.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as the organizer of a scheduled call with the FBI in June 2019.

events.title: Scheduled Call with FBI
events.description: A 30-minute call was scheduled between Jeffrey Epstein and the FBI.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was in direct communication with the FBI, scheduling a call for June 28, 2019.
The call was scheduled just days before his arrest on July 6, 2019.
The calendar entry was created on June 24, 2019, indicating planned contact between Epstein and federal investigators.
